activity_differential: group of people walking through indoor market
camera following group into food court
people socializing and moving through shopping area
description: A group of people walk through an indoor market or shopping area, passing through decorative doors and into a food court area. The camera follows their movement, panning and dollying forward as the group progresses through the space. Some people are seen sitting and eating at tables in the food court.
